title: How to Reset Your Password
content:
Step 1: Navigate to the login page and click 'Forgot Password'.
Step 2: Enter your registered email address.
Step 3: Check your email for a password reset link.
Step 4: Click the link and enter your new password.
Step 5: Confirm your new password and save changes.

Note: Password reset links expire after 24 hours. If you encounter issues, contact IT Support.

title: Requesting Equipment and Assets
content:
To request new equipment or check out company assets:

1. Navigate to the Ticket Management system
2. Create a new ticket and select 'Asset Check Out' category
3. Provide detailed information about the equipment needed
4. Include the business justification
5. Specify expected return date if applicable
6. Attach any supporting documentation

Your request will be reviewed by the Asset Management team within 2 business days. Approved requests will be fulfilled based on availability.
author: Sarah Johnson

title: Server Maintenance Windows Schedule
content:
All company servers undergo routine maintenance according to the following schedule:

• Weekly Maintenance: Every Sunday, 2:00 AM - 4:00 AM PST
• Monthly Deep Maintenance: First Sunday of each month, 1:00 AM - 6:00 AM PST
• Emergency Maintenance: As needed (advance notice will be provided when possible)

During maintenance windows:
- All services will be temporarily unavailable
- Save your work before the maintenance window
- Do not attempt to access systems during maintenance
- Services will be restored automatically upon completion

For emergency issues outside maintenance windows, contact the System Administration team immediately.

title: Working from Home Guidelines
content:
Remote work policy and best practices:

**Eligibility:**
- All employees may request remote work with manager approval
- Must have reliable internet connection (minimum 25 Mbps)
- Dedicated workspace at home

**Requirements:**
- Available during core business hours (9 AM - 3 PM)
- Maintain regular communication with team
- Use company VPN for all work activities
- Secure home office environment

**Equipment:**
- Company-issued laptop and peripherals
- VPN access credentials
- Video conferencing setup

Contact HR for remote work agreement forms and IT Support for technical setup assistance.
author: Emily Rodriguez

title: Company Holiday Calendar 2025
content:
Official company holidays for 2025:

• New Year's Day: January 1
• Martin Luther King Jr. Day: January 20
• Presidents' Day: February 17
• Memorial Day: May 26
• Independence Day: July 4
• Labor Day: September 1
• Thanksgiving: November 27-28
• Christmas: December 25

Additional floating holidays: 2 days per year (must be pre-approved)

All holidays are paid days off. If a holiday falls on a weekend, the company will observe it on the nearest weekday. Please coordinate time-off requests with your manager at least 2 weeks in advance.
